id: 置換対象モデルPmxファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the replacement target model Pmx file.

id: 置換対象モデルの使い方
translation:
・Specify the PMX model used by both the Name Replacement and Csv Output tabs.
・After successful loading, the viewer is updated and the model is used to build table candidates.
・Use "Open" to choose a file and "History" to reselect previously used paths.

id: 置換辞書データファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the replacement dictionary data (Csv) file.

id: 置換辞書データの使い方
translation:
・Specify the dictionary Csv used by the Name Replacement tab.
・Required columns are: file_name, source_name, japanese_name, english_name (4 columns).
・After loading, replacement candidates are expanded into the Name Replacement table.

id: 出力モデル(Pmx)ファイルパスを指定してください
translation: Please specify the output model (Pmx) file path.

・Output PMX path for the name-replaced model.
・If empty, a path is proposed automatically from replacement results.
・Required output directories are created automatically when saving.

・Purpose: replace PMX names in bulk using a dictionary Csv, then save a translated PMX.
・Flow: 1) Open target model (Pmx) 2) Open dictionary (Csv) 3) Review/edit table rows 4) Confirm output model path and click Save.
・If dictionary Csv is not loaded, the Name Replacement table is not shown.

・Purpose: pick model name entries and build a dictionary Csv.
・Flow: 1) Open target model (Pmx) 2) Adjust checks in the candidate table 3) Confirm output Csv path and click Save.
・The segmented column shows symbol/number split candidates for vocabulary extraction.

Failed to generate the replacement model.
Error message: {{.Error}}

Failed to output the replacement model.
Error message: {{.Error}}

Successfully output the replacement model.

Output path: %s

id: 出力モデルなしメッセージ
translation:
No replaceable output model was found.
Please redo the preview.

A tool to replace PMX names (model/material/bone/morph/display slot/rigid body/joint/texture/path) using dictionary Csv, and manage Csv input/output.
The three tabs cover dictionary creation, name replacement, and dictionary merge output.

・Name Replacement tab: replace PMX names using dictionary Csv and save translated PMX.
・Csv Output tab: extract candidate names from PMX and save dictionary Csv.
・Csv Append tab: merge base/additional dictionary Csv files and save merged Csv.
・Completion is reported in Info log and notification sound.

id: 出力Csvファイルパスを指定してください
translation: Please specify the output Csv file path.

id: 出力Csvファイルパスの使い方
translation:
・Output Csv path used by both Csv Output and Csv Append tabs.
・If empty, a path is auto-proposed from input file names.
・If an existing file is specified, it is overwritten.

Failed to output Csv data.
Error message: {{.Error}}

Successfully output Csv data.

Output path: %s

id: 文字列未入力テキスト

translation:
・Purpose: append vocabulary from an additional dictionary Csv into a base dictionary Csv.
・Flow: 1) Open base Csv 2) Open additional Csv 3) Select rows in append table 4) Confirm output Csv (merged) and click Save.
・Duplicate detection is based on source name. Rows that exist only in the additional Csv are checked by default.
・Turn off rows you want to keep unchanged and output only the differences.

id: 追加元Csvデータファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the source dictionary data (Csv) file

id: 追加元Csvデータの使い方
translation:
・Specify the base dictionary Csv used as merge source.
・Selected additional rows are appended after this base content.

id: 追加対象Csvデータファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the target dictionary data (Csv) file

id: 追加対象Csvデータの使い方
translation:
・Specify the additional dictionary Csv used for comparison.
・Rows whose source names do not exist in base Csv are auto-checked.

id: 名称置換テーブルの使い方
translation:
・Replacement target list (type/idx/source/japanese/english/remarks).
・Only checked rows are reflected when saving.
・Select a row to edit Japanese/English names individually.
・If type is Bone and Japanese name exceeds 15 bytes in Shift-JIS, the row is shown in red and remarks displays "Bone name exceeds 15 bytes".
・This warning exists because bone names are truncated to 15 bytes when saving VMD. If overlength names remain, motion may not apply correctly when loading that VMD on a new model.

id: Csv出力候補テーブルの使い方
translation:
・Vocabulary candidates to export into dictionary Csv (type/segmented/japanese/english).
・Checked Japanese names are exported.
・Use header sort and segmented column to validate vocabulary coverage.

id: Csv追加テーブルの使い方
translation:
・Merged comparison list of base/additional Csv (source/japanese/english).
・Only checked rows are included in merged output.
・Turn off rows you do not want to append.

id: 保存ボタン(名称置換)の使い方
translation:
・Saves PMX with checked rows from Name Replacement table.
・Info log and notification sound are emitted on completion.

id: 保存ボタン(Csv出力)の使い方
translation:
・Saves checked rows from Csv Output candidate table as dictionary Csv.
・Info log and notification sound are emitted on completion.

id: 保存ボタン(Csv追加)の使い方
translation:
・Merges checked rows from Csv Append table and saves merged Csv.
・Info log and notification sound are emitted on completion.

id: 出力Csv(追加結果)の使い方
translation:
・Output path for merged Csv created in Csv Append tab.
・If empty, path is auto-proposed from the base Csv path.

・Opens file dialog to choose input files or output destination.
・For output pickers, you can also enter a new file name.

・Shows recently used file paths.
・Selecting an item reloads that path immediately.
